Begin the journey of your lifetime.

The Academy has been preparing students for life since 1987. Our graduates are well-prepared to meet the challenges of the future.

Learn more...

Our School

College preparatory education for the children of international families

No matter what you study at The Academy, you’ll explore more than just the how of the subject, you’ll dig deep into the why. You’ll also grow invaluable skills as a writer. Whether it’s composing a critique of Chaucer or arguing the pros and cons of nuclear energy, you’ll learn how to put content in context and ground your writing in data.

Our Values

A tradition of excellence

Character
We act responsibly and with integrity. We are honest and respectful.
Courage
We take risks and learn from failure. We are resilient.
Compassion
We act with empathy, caring for our communities and the world.

Our Mission

Fostering a community of inquisitive learners and independent thinkers, inspired to be their best selves, empowered to make a difference.

Academics

A different way to live & learn

Here, you decide which academic passions to pursue. An education at the Academy will challenge you to be your best self and prepare you for a life of purpose.

  • 10:1
    student to faculty ratio
    All courses are taught by professors—most hold a Ph.D. or terminal degree in their field.
  • 50
    majors, minors and concentrations.
    Approximately 20% of The Academy students pursue a double or self-designed major.
  • 30%
    of our students major in the sciences.
    Our students are often recognized with the most prestigious scholarships in STEM.
  • 92%
    of students progress to higher education
    Nearly 70% of students go on to grad school within 10 years of graduation.

REMOTE & HYBRID LEARNING

Continuity of Learning

During these times of uncertainty, The Academy offers seamless transitions between on-site, remote and hybrid learning. This maintains high academic standards and supports mental wellbeing and our strong sense of community.

EXAM RESULTS & UNIVERSITY DESTINATIONS

Acheiving Excellence

The Academy has a well-deserved reputation for academic success. It attracts bright student, who thrive amongst like-minded friends, and fulfil their potential. After The Academy, pupils progress to top universities in the Japan and abroad.

COMMUNITY

Building an extra-curricular community

Outside the classrooms our students form friendships through the many clubs and societies on offer. New clubs are formed when interests are shared. A huge choice of activities, both sporting and cultural, give students the chance to balance their academic schedules with broader and less pressurised pursuits.

Student Life

Life at the Academy

The Academy is a place where you'll do more than learn what others have already discovered. You'll try out new interests and uncover talents you didn't know you had. Meet interesting people who share your passions and others who will flip your worldview in ways you could never imagine. Follow your curiosity to its limits, and make discoveries and breakthroughs that make a difference to your campus, community and even the world.

  • 40
    The average number of theatrical productions held on campus every year.
  • 13
    instrumental groups perform each semester, including the the Sundanese gamelan degung ensemble.
  • 8
    student acapella groups warble regularly on campus—some tour during winter and spring breaks.
  • 3
    spring exhibition in the Gallery featuring works by senior studio art majors in their final step towards graduation.

LIFE OUTSIDE THE CLASSROOM

Clubs, Societies, Arts & Culture

Arts

There is certainly no shortage of opportunities for students to shine in the arts with opportunities to act, play music and engage in debate.

Athletics

Our high school teams compete in 15 sports against other schools in 250 matches.

Student Travel

Get to know one another in person while experiencing a new place or culture.

Meetups

Host in-person events for students to gather together and further the bonds they have made in classes online.

Student Clubs & Circles

The Academy offers numerous clubs and circles that appeal to a variety of different interests.

Service

Service projects offer our students challenging ways to learn and contribute to society.

“The Academy has established a truly amazing community of learners, educators and supporters. The school provides a unique hybrid space with online flipped classrooms enriched by in-person opportunities through regional meetups and residential programs.”

Tomohiro Hoshi, Ph.D.
Head of School

Admissions

Supporting your application

The Academy has its own unique admissions process. We look for students with enquiring minds and natural intelligence. Our founder’s ethos was to educate such people, whatever their background, hence our generous bursary provision. Experienced staff assist in every stage of the process, from initial inquiry through to choosing a house, to sitting the entrance exams.

Apply Now

Office of Admissions

5555-222-1412
admissions@theacademy.com

An international school for the global world.

The Academy offers an American-style college preparatory education. With a standards-based curriculum culminating in an a high school diploma, our program develops the necessary skills for today's global world.
